text.tspan: Freddy - Close the door when he peers in.
Bonnie - Don't check Foxy's cam when the desk minifigure doesn't represent him!
Chica - When the pots and pans stop clinging in the kitchen, change the music!
Foxy - Repeatedly check on him in pirates cove.
Toy Freddy - Help him beat Five Nights at Mr. Hugs, or there's consequences.
Toy Bonnie - Use the mask when he appears.
Toy Chica - Use the mask when she appears.
Mangle - Block her way in the office using the Vent Snare.
BB - Close the side vent when he appears there, or the flashlight won't work.
JJ - Close the side vent when she appears there, or the doors won't work.
Marionette - Wind up her music box in the kitchen.
W Bonnie - Use the mask when he appears
W Chica - Block her way in the office using the Vent Snare.
W Golden Freddy - Use the mask when he appears, or flick the cameras up.
Springtrap - Close the top vent when he appears there!
Phantom Mangle - Flick those cameras down when she appears on one!
Phantom Freddy - Just flash him every now and then.
Phantom BB - Flick those cameras down when he appears, or change the camera.
Nightmare Freddy - Flash those three Freddles away!
Nightmare Bonnie - Buy his plush at prize counter when he appears in the right hall.
Nightmare Fredbear - When you hear his laugh, close the left door.
Nightmare - When you hear his laugh, close the right door.
Jack O Chica - Don't let it get too hot!
Nightmare Mangle - Buy her plush at prize counter when she appears in the right hall
Nightmarionne - Keep that mouse off her!
Nightmare BB - Flash him when he's standing up!
Old Man Consequences - Catch the fish when the minigame appears.
Circus Baby - Buy her plush at prize counter when she appears in the right hall
Ballora - Listen to her music, then close the door you hear it from.
Funtime Foxy - Check cams at exactly the time given at funtime foxy's cove to delay the show!
Ennard - Close the top vent when you hear it.
Trash & the Gang - ???
Helpy - Click it off the desk when it appears
Happy Frog - Lurks in the ducts, use the audio lure to keep it away from the office. The heater won't work.
Mr Hippo - Lurks in the ducts, use the heater or audio lure to keep it away from the office.
Pigpatch- Lurks in the ducts, use the heater or audio lure to keep it away from the office.
Neddbear- Lurks in the ducts, use the heater or audio lure to keep it away from the office.
Orville- Lurks in the ducts, use the heater or audio lure to keep it away from the office.
Rockstar Freddy - When he asks, deposit five coins.
Rockstar Bonnie - If he appears in the office, quickly find his guitar on a cam and click it.
Rockstar Chica - She doesn't like wet floors, I think you see where i'm going with this.
Rockstar Foxy - Click his parrot for a chance to choose a fortune
Music Man - Keep it quiet, how loud his Cymballs are represent the noise.
El Chip - He likes advertising.
Funtime Chica - She likes to show off. Inconveniently right infront of you.
Scrap Baby - When she moves, give her a controlled shock!
Molten Freddy - When you hear his laugh, close the top vent.
Scraptrap - He rushes down the side vent only once a night, close it when you hear him rushing.
Lefty - Keep it quiet! The global music box calms her down.
Phone Guy - Just mute his call, or he'll make a lot of noise.
PRESS "SPACE" TO
RETURN TO MENU
